channel.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
channel.desc: Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals! Call 0800 090 3393 or visit us at www.loveitbookit.com/tv.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Devizes to transform a tired old plot into a desert garden, reminiscent of Arabia, for John and Vanessa.

channel.desc: Lee and Chris are in Keynsham to design a Zen family space for Craig, Becky and their three boys.

channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team leave the farm in search of work and head to the coast to reap the ocean's bounty.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives strangers Noam and Sara the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Newport. But will their grand designs stop them from making enough money to buy a house of their own.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Tool Club
channel.desc: The team are in Dumfries to help Lucy renovate her tired bookshop - The Wobbly Shelf - to create a hub for the LGBTQ+ community.
